channel.title: Big problems
channel.description: Well, I'm using the Richscape source and sometimes when people log in after logging off or from a disconnect jad randomly attacks them with his range attack? Like all of a sudden Jad's range attack falls from the sky and k0's them. How can I fix this? Also, if anybody knows how to fix the x-log dupe I also need help on that, I heard that was an easy fix though.

item.title: Big problems
item.dc:creator: @Ibehustlin247 Ibehustlin247
item.description:
@Ibehustlin247 wrote:

Well, I’m using the Richscape source and sometimes when people log in after logging off or from a disconnect jad randomly attacks them with his range attack? Like all of a sudden Jad’s range attack falls from the sky and k0’s them. How can I fix this? Also, if anybody knows how to fix the x-log dupe I also need help on that, I heard that was an easy fix though.

Read full topic
